process.name: purify rock salt into table/epsom salt and other compounds
process.description: http://www.madehow.com/Volume-2/Salt.html One method of evaporating brine is solar evaporation. Most brine is processed by a multiple-effect vacuum evaporator. This device consists of three or more closed metal cylinders with conical bottoms. Brine is first treated chemically to remove calcium and magnesium compounds. It then fills the bottom. Brine may also be processed in a grainer.

process.name: make pulp from cane fiber and crop waste
make pulp from cane fiber and crop waste (large batch)
make paper, napkin and toilet tissue from pulp
make paper, napkin and toilet tissue from pulp (large batch)
make bleaching chemical for paper making
make bleaching chemical for paper making (large batch)
make sodium hypochlorite for bleaching and sanitation
make sodium hypochlorite for bleaching and sanitation (large batch)
make fertilizers for growing crops (large batch)
do carbon monoxide iron reduction
process.description: Fe<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub> + 3CO -> 2Fe + 3CO<sub>2</sub>

process.name: do carbon monoxide iron reduction (large batch)
process.description: Fe<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub> + 3CO -> 2Fe + 3CO<sub>2</sub>

process.name: do hydrogen iron reduction
process.description: Fe<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub> + 3H<sub>2</sub> -> 2Fe + 3H<sub>2</sub>O

process.name: do hydrogen iron reduction (large batch)
process.description: Fe<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub> + 3H<sub>2</sub> -> 2Fe + 3H<sub>2</sub>O

process.name: cast aluminum ingot
process.description: Al<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub> + 3C -> 2Al + 3CO; 1 mole - Al2CO3: 101.96g; 3C: 36g; 2Al: 54g; 3CO: 64g

process.name: cast aluminum ingot (large batch)
process.description: Al<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub> + 3C -> 2Al + 3CO

process.name: make aluminum sheet
process.description: Al<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub> + 3C -> 2Al + 3CO

process.name: do pyrolyze reaction
process.description: CH<sub>4</sub> -> C + 2H<sub>2</sub>

process.name: do advanced pyrolyze reaction
process.description: CH<sub>4</sub> -> C + 2H<sub>2</sub>

process.name: produce polyester resin
process.description: This is to produce unsaturated polyester resin (C<sub>10</sub>H<sub>8</sub>O<sub>4</sub>). We don't have a detailed process for producing polyester, so we're just using component elements.

process.name: roll mylar film
process.description: Mylar coated with evaporated aluminum on one side

process.name: roll aluminized mylar foil
process.description: Biaxially oriented PET film is metallized by vapor deposition of a thin film of evaporated aluminium, gold, or other metal onto it.

process.name: make coolant bottle
process.description: Using ethylene glycol as a coolant. C<sub>2</sub>H<sub>4</sub>O + H<sub>2</sub>O -> HOCH<sub>2</sub>CH<sub>2</sub>OH

process.name: make eva backpack
process.description: Polyethylene box with steel frame and fiberglass cloth straps.

process.name: do steel ingot nickel alloying (large batch)
roll heat pipe from copper sheet
roll heat pipe from aluminum sheet
do potassium chloride electrolysis
process.description: 2 K+(aq) + 2H<sub>2</sub>O(l) + 2eâˆ’ â†’ H<sub>2</sub>(g) + 2 KOH(aq) 2 Clâ€“ â€” 2eâˆ’ â†’ Cl<sub>2</sub>(g)

process.name: manufacture chemical battery
process.description: At operating voltage of 4.2V, the lithium content is 0.075g/Wh. For a cathode material (LiMn1.5Ni0.5O4) on a lithium ion battery, when cycled at C/30 in the 2.5-4.3V voltage range, the theoretical capacity of LiNMC Q_specific is 165 mAh g-1. or 160 Ah kg-1. At 3.8V, 3.8V * 160 mAh g-1 = 608 Wh kg-1. Content is 1.6447 kg/kWh Assume li-ion battery capacity is 17 kWh.

process.name: manufacture eva battery
process.description: Assume a small EVA battery has the capacity of 0.5kWh.

process.name: manufacture polycarbonate roofing
process.description: Asahi/Chi Mei produces DPC (polycarbonate) from DMC which is produced via methanolysis of ethylene carbonate. Ethylene carbonate is produced by the reaction between ethyleneâ€…oxide and carbonâ€…dioxide.

process.name: produce bisphenol-a
process.description: Bisphenol A (BPA), a colourless crystalline solid belonging to the family of organic compounds; its molecular formula is C15H16O2. BPA is best known for its use in the manufacture of polycarbonate plastics and epoxy resins

process.name: make ceramic electrolyte
process.description: Ceramic electrolytes are critical for the production of batteries and fuel cells

process.name: make methane solid oxide fuel cells
process.description: Each methane solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) can generate 200W. Each fuel cell weighs 0.2 kg.

process.name: make methanol fuel cells
process.description: Each methanol fuel cell (SOFC) can generate 200W. Each fuel cell weighs 0.2 kg.

process.name: make methane fuel cell stack
process.description: Each fuel cell stack comprises 75 solid oxide fuel cells at 15 kWe.

process.name: make methanol fuel cell stack
process.description: Each fuel cell stack comprises 75 solid oxide fuel cells at 15 kW.

process.name: gasify sugarcane and biomass into methanol
process.description: Use biomass gasification to derive methanol, which is useful for powering PEM fuel cells.
